title: Wordpress Developer
description: We are seeking for 1 (One) talented and enthusiastic WordPress QA Engineer to join our dynamic team.The ideal candidate should have proven success in WordPress themes and plugins development and to provide high-quality products that meet the needs and expectations of our users.
responsibilities: Ensure that our plugin products, applications, and systems work correctly.
Beta testing for all plugins and themes on Each Update.
Do Testing Like - User Experience testing, functionality tests, regression tests, compatibility tests, etc.
Measuring performance, reporting issues, and monitoring the work to resolve them.
Producing screenshots or videos to illustrate how to reproduce the issue.
Work with development teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle.
Monitoring and managing the performance of the live website.
experiences: You must be super familiar with WordPress and have experience in testing WordPress plugins and themes.
You must need to be an expert user of Theme builders like - Elementor.
Understand the concepts of black-box testing, white-box testing, regression testing, unit testing, user testing, and automated/manual testing.
You also need to have sufficient knowledge of CSS, PHP, and JavaScript to know how to narrow down possible sources/triggers of a bug/issue.
Communication skill to work with a team
requirements: We prioritize skills over formal educational qualifications.
Good expertise in reading and writing in English is a must
Sample of work or projects
Quick learner
benefits: Employee loan facility (zero percent interest rate)
Unlimited Coffee & tea along with snacks
